sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, Dropdown, Button, Tab, Tabs, ListGroup, Row, Col, Table, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import FileUpload from "../FileUpload"; import "./ProjectSummaryDashboard.css"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getProjectById } from "../../actions/project"; const ProjectSummaryDashboard = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProjectById(props.id)) .then(() => { console.log("Project fetched successfully for summary"); }) .catch(() => { console.log("Unable to fetch project for summary"); }); }, [dispatch]); const { project:content } = useSelector((state) => state.projectById); if (content.length === 0) { console.log("??"); return ; } const project = content[0]; const statusType = { TO_DO: "To-Do", IN_PROGRESS: "In Progress", COMPLETED: "Completed", SUSPENDED: "Suspended", }; return ( {project.client.fullName} {/* Options View Edit Delete   + Add View Edit Delete   */} {/* TODOS: */} {/* ROLE OF BUTTONS? */}

{project.projectName}

Due By:{" "} {project.endDate.substring(0, 10)} {/* TODOS: */} {/* Start date or end date? */}     {statusType[project.status]}

{project.description}
Team Members:
  • {project.projectManager.firstName + " " + project.projectManager.lastName}{" "} Project Manager
    • {project.teamMembers .filter((tm) => tm.id !== project.projectManager.id) .map((tm) => { return
  • {tm.firstName + " " + tm.lastName}
    • ; })}
{/*
*/}

PROJECT SUMMARY

TOTAL HOURS
Billable Hours 0.00
Non - Billable Hours 0.00
TOTAL EXPENSES
Billable Expenses 0.00
Non - Billable Expenses 0.00
); }; export default ProjectSummaryDashboard;
